sentences.en: An Englishman is a foreigner outside the United Kingdom.
sentences.cn: 英国人出了联合王国就是外国人.

sentences.en: Being a foreigner, Carl did not catch on to the joke.
sentences.cn: 卡尔是个外国人, 不能了解这笑话的含意.

sentences.en: Being a foreigner, he did not catch on the joke.
sentences.cn: 他是个外国人, 未能理解这个笑话的含意.

sentences.en: He was afraid she would reject him because he was a foreigner.
sentences.cn: 他担心她会因他不是本国人而拒绝他.

sentences.en: Her family disowned her for marrying a foreigner.
sentences.cn: 她的家人因她嫁给了外国人而与她断绝关系。

sentences.en: His accent argues him to be a foreigner.
sentences.cn: 他的腔调表明他是个外国人.

sentences.en: I also used to love the smooth way in which the foreigner operated.
sentences.cn: 我也曾经喜欢那个老外平稳流畅的操作方式。

sentences.en: It is, in a way , presumptuous for a foreigner to teach Spanish.
sentences.cn: 外国人教西班牙语可多少有点自不量力.

sentences.en: She was still a foreigner, unsure of her ground.
sentences.cn: 她仍是一位异乡人, 对自己的地位缺乏信心.

sentences.en: Some of the local people are suspicious of foreigners.
sentences.cn: 有些当地人不信任外国人。

sentences.en: The fact that I was a foreigner was a big disadvantage.
sentences.cn: 我是外国人这事实对我十分不利。

sentences.en: The foreigner felt desolate in the strange country.
sentences.cn: 外国人住在异国感到孤寂.

sentences.en: The foreigner spoke to us quite intelligibly.
sentences.cn: 这个外国人对我们讲的话理解很好.

sentences.en: To a considerable degree host countries object primarily to having foreigner's control their enterprises.
sentences.cn: 在相当大的程度上,东道国主要是反对外国人控制其企业.

sentences.en: We are negotiating with a foreigner for trade.
sentences.cn: 我们正与外国人商谈贸易.

sentences.en: You don't sound like a foreigner talking English.
sentences.cn: 听你讲英语，不像是外国人。

words.tran_cn: 外国的；外交的；异质的；不相关的

trans.tran_cn: 外国人，外人，陌生人，外来物，进口货物，（非本土的）外来动植物
trans.tran_en: someone who comes from a different country
